thought: I need to craft a beetroot_soup, which requires a bowl and 6 beetroot. I have a bowl in slot 38 and 6 beetroot in slot 16. I will first move the beetroot into the crafting grid, starting with the first slot (1).
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
